name: Oxford University
the-point: Oxford University is older than the Aztec Empire.

name: Honey Longevity
the-point: Honey never spoils. You can eat 3,000-year-old honey found in Egyptian tombs.

name: Shark Age
the-point: Sharks are older than trees and the rings of Saturn.

name: Venus Day
the-point: A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus.

name: Banana DNA
the-point: Humans share about 50% of their DNA with bananas.

name: Cloud Weight
the-point: An average fluffy cumulus cloud weighs about 1.1 million pounds.

name: The Moon Smell
the-point: According to Apollo astronauts, the moon smells like spent gunpowder.

name: Nintendo History
the-point: Nintendo was founded in 1889, originally making playing cards.

name: Wombat Poop
the-point: Wombats are the only animals that have cube-shaped poop.

name: Cleopatra Time
the-point: Cleopatra lived closer to the invention of the iPhone than the building of the Great Pyramid.

name: Russia Surface
the-point: Russia has a larger surface area than the (former) planet Pluto.

name: Stomach Acid
the-point: Human stomach acid is strong enough to dissolve razor blades.

name: Cashew Shells
the-point: Cashews grow on the bottom of 'apples' and their shells are toxic.

name: Silence Records
the-point: The quietest room in the world is so silent you can hear your own blood flowing.

name: Octopus Hearts
the-point: An octopus has three hearts and blue blood.

name: Statue of Liberty
the-point: The Statue of Liberty used to be the color of a penny (copper) before it oxidized.

name: Deadly Vending Machines
the-point: You are statistically more likely to be killed by a vending machine than a shark.

name: Eiffel Tower Height
the-point: The Eiffel Tower can be 15 cm taller during the summer due to thermal expansion.

name: Space Water
the-point: There is a floating reservoir of water in space that holds 140 trillion times the mass of Earth's oceans.

name: Fingerprints
the-point: Koalas have fingerprints that are so human-like they have confused crime scene investigators.

name: Lighter vs Match
the-point: The lighter was invented before the match.

name: Snail Sleep
the-point: A snail can sleep for three years straight.

name: Group of Crows
the-point: A group of crows is called a 'murder'.

name: Blue Whale Tongue
the-point: A blue whale's tongue weighs as much as an entire elephant.

name: M&M Origins
the-point: M&Ms were created so soldiers could carry chocolate without it melting.
